description: Documentation standards for CS2 RL agent analysis logs
rule:
When working with documentation files in the analysis_log directory, follow these practices:

1. Include a 'Last updated' note after the title: *Last updated: YYYY-MM-DD - Brief description of changes*

2. Add appropriate tags immediately after the 'Last updated' note using format: **Tags:** #tag1 #tag2 #tag3
   Only use tags defined in document_tags.md

3. Follow the standard document structure:
   - Context/Introduction
   - Methodology
   - Findings
   - Relationship to Other Components
   - Optimization Opportunities
   - Next Steps/Recommendations

4. Provide backlinks to related documents

5. Use H1 (#) for document titles only, H2 (##) for major sections, H3 (###) for subsections

6. When creating new documents, immediately add references in the appropriate index files

7. Never create separate growing logs that would consume context window space

8. Prefer in-place documentation updates with version notes
